Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a clutch three-run homer in the top of the ninth inning
Starling Marte hit a single, scoring Jesse Winker for the insurance run
Post-Match Reflections: Francisco Lindor had to cut his postgame interview short as he rushed over to take a team picture
Steve Cohen was in 'total disbelief' watching Alonso homer
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Empire State Building turns blue and orange
J.D. Martinez was seen giving Pete Alonso a generous helping of champagne
Champagne is flying all over the place in the visitor's locker room at American Family Field as the Mets soak in their well-deserved wild-card series win against the Brewers
